entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin who is going to Smeltings school.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Dudley's father and has an old school called Smeltings.

entities.name: smeltings
entities.description: Smeltings is a school where Uncle Vernon went to and Dudley will be attending.

entities.name: piers polkiss
entities.description: Piers Polkiss is another student who will be attending Smeltings with Dudley.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is going to Stonewall High school.

entities.name: stonewall high
entities.description: Stonewall High is a local comprehensive school where Harry will be attending.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Dudley's mother and takes him to London to buy his Smeltings uniform.

entities.name: mrs figg
entities.description: Mrs Figg is a neighbor who looks after Harry while Aunt Petunia is away.

relationships.description: Dudley will be attending Smeltings school.
Harry will be attending Stonewall High school.
